body: Hi all, to evaluate the difference between an annual analysis in E+ with and without thermal history (warmup+sim) we tried to develop a way to overcome the LB-limits of the analysis period component (switching from h24 to h1). But still we can't make it run. Is there a way to achieve an animated one-by-one hour E+simulation with an alternative analysisPeriod-construction? Thanks in advance, Daniel[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UUHZoZFGT4hO4Uwq6Uli2qmFZHR*QwarQZtb9zcE95g38Lysf-s4lWON1pSCFlpBagLqcU8zdf1YmlM-E2xKsciT*MOas5ET/timestep.jpg)
topic: HOURLY SIMULATION WITHOUT THERMAL HISTORY - ANALYSIS PERIOD
